string-array.name: quote_list
string-array.item: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired - Jules Renard
Excellence is an art won by training and habituation - Aristotle
If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in litle matters - Colin Powell
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit - Aristotle
Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits - Twyla Tharp
Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken - Warren Buffet
You need to put what you learn into practice and do it over and over again until it is a habit - Brett Hoebel
